thread.title: All Halo 5 Achievements Revealed - IGN News
thread.title_full: All Halo 5 Achievements Revealed - IGN News

title: All Halo 5 Achievements Revealed - IGN News
text:
All Halo 5 Achievements Revealed Share. By Brian Albert 
343 has revealed the full achievement list for Halo 5: Guardians . 
Halo 5 has 65 achievements worth a combined total of 1000 gamerscore, Waypoint has confirmed. They range from simple tasks like completing campaign missions to hunting down intel, winning multiplayer matches, and finding creative ways to beat levels. Got feedback on our player? We want to hear it. 
Some standouts are: Lone Wolf: Complete every mission of the game on Legendary difficulty, by yourself Gravelord: Find and claim all skulls Hunt the Truth: Find and claim all intel Go for the Gold: Open a gold REQ pack Benchwarmer: Spectate a game 
We have the full list of Halo 5 achievements here, including how many points they're each worth, but be warned -- some of them include names of levels, characters, and scenarios. We didn't see any obvious spoilers, but maybe don't take a look quite yet if you want to go into the game blind. 
Halo 5 will be released on October 27. Check IGN's Halo 5 wiki at launch for a full skull guide , intel chart, a Legendary walkthrough, and much more.
